title: Impact of transatlantic slave trade on Africa

content.question: Which of the following occurred in nineteenth-century Africa as a result of the end of the transatlantic slave trade?

choices.label: An increased use of slave labor within Africa

content.answer: An increased use of slave labor within Africa

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
